page.title: 07NICOLA'S TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: We got up Saturday morning quite early. Dad went outside to work and mum did the cleaning while my sister and I watched television. At 11.45 I went to have my ears pierced, then we went to my nanna's. Mum went home and we had pork, runner beans, broad beans, Yorkshire Pudding, and a sausage, followed by yoghurt for dinner. When we had cleared away, we watched television all afternoon, until our cousins came with the twins. After tea we played games until they went home at 8.00 and I went to bed at 10.15. On Sunday morning I got up and made a cup of tea for my grandad. I got breakfast when nanna came down. At 11.00 I went home to mum and dad. We had a roast dinner at 1.45 and then watched television all afternoon.
